channel.title: APL on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku
channel.description: Recent content in APL on The Weekly Challenge - Perl & Raku

item.title: Perl Weekly Challenge - Guest Contributions
item.description: As you know, “Perl Weekly Challenge”, primarily focus on Perl and Raku. During the Week #018, we received the solution to “Perl Weekly Challenge - 018” by Orestis Zekai in Python. It was a pleasant surprise to receive solution in something other than Perl and Raku. Ever since regular team members also started contributing in other languages like APL, Bash, C, C++, Go, Haskell, Idris, Javascript, Lisp, Node, Postscript, Prolog, R, Ruby, Rust, Swift and HTML.
